nodes.text: The Gargolyn monster was a huge creature native to Gargolyn IV. It once terrorized a Cor village until a shaman bound it to the land. This act remained effective as long as Cor remained on that location; however, the Karflo Corporation forcibly relocated the tribe causing the beast to re-emerge and attack their construction site. Once the Cor tribe was returned to their tribal lands, the beast was able to be subdued.
